title: What is a cardiovascular benefit? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which helps to keep your blood circulation in good maitainance and help keep healthy heart muscles and pumping of blood takes care of your muscles in your body in general and blood vessels proper functioning without forming bad cholesterol and avoid blood vessels arteries elasticity , avoiding them getting rigid ,vasodilation property .lungs ,liver etc body parts active

If you are having extra fat then cardiovascular excercises are best to loose weight. Also you can enjoy the process by doing whatever activity suits you like dancing, running, football games etc. But also focus on the strength based excercises to gain muscles.
